about_the_game:
UNYIELDER unites Looter-Shooters, Movement FPS and Character Action Games in an infinitely expandable Roguelite to create Spectacular, Absurd and Chaotic Boss battles.




  • BREAK THE GAME: Like any good toy, play with it vigorously, experiment. (and have fun)
  • EMBODY TENACITY: The further you go, the more dangerous the world becomes. (but so do you)
  • DOMINATION: Gather unique weapons and perks to empower your build and playstyle. (or just pick the weird stuff, who's going to stop you?)
  • BYOBoss: With parts from enemies you defeat, customize the Final Boss to unlock special weapons, perks and characters.

    EREBUS, THE CAPITAL CITY OF ANTARCTICA, 1972

    A hotspot for apocalyptic-level events, after decades of existential torment, EREBUS finally collapsed. Towering derelicts of the once concrete utopia are buried in dunes of rust: “PNEUMA”, a by-product of entropic weapons; Man-made "Heaven".



    CARVE YOUR PATH
    Journey through the war-torn lands of EREBUS, Defeat enemies, loot weapons, grow in power.

    A WALKING CATACLYSM OF YOUR OWN DESIGN
    Wield RUPTURE, RHAPSODY and REVERIE, volatile sources of ineffable power.
    Unleash your unique brand of devastation with bizarre weapons and perks.

    BUILD YOUR FINAL BOSS
    Scavenge the data of slain enemies and build your own Pattern of machine-god punching bag. Unique combinations alter the boss fight.
    Discover hidden Patterns to pave for new, Endgame Character classes, Weapons, Perks and other Secrets.

    Featuring an Original Soundtrack Composed and Produced by Kāru

    JOIN OUR COMMUNITY

    We're a brood of passionate artists and developers, come say hi! We don't bite unless you want us to :>

    Don't be afraid to talk to us, we're busy working on the game but will respond when we're able to!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains guns and graphical violence.

detailed_description:
UNYIELDER unites Looter-Shooters, Movement FPS and Character Action Games in an infinitely expandable Roguelite to create Spectacular, Absurd and Chaotic Boss battles.




  • BREAK THE GAME: Like any good toy, play with it vigorously, experiment. (and have fun)
  • EMBODY TENACITY: The further you go, the more dangerous the world becomes. (but so do you)
  • DOMINATION: Gather unique weapons and perks to empower your build and playstyle. (or just pick the weird stuff, who's going to stop you?)
  • BYOBoss: With parts from enemies you defeat, customize the Final Boss to unlock special weapons, perks and characters.

    EREBUS, THE CAPITAL CITY OF ANTARCTICA, 1972

    A hotspot for apocalyptic-level events, after decades of existential torment, EREBUS finally collapsed. Towering derelicts of the once concrete utopia are buried in dunes of rust: “PNEUMA”, a by-product of entropic weapons; Man-made "Heaven".



    CARVE YOUR PATH
    Journey through the war-torn lands of EREBUS, Defeat enemies, loot weapons, grow in power.

    A WALKING CATACLYSM OF YOUR OWN DESIGN
    Wield RUPTURE, RHAPSODY and REVERIE, volatile sources of ineffable power.
    Unleash your unique brand of devastation with bizarre weapons and perks.

    BUILD YOUR FINAL BOSS
    Scavenge the data of slain enemies and build your own Pattern of machine-god punching bag. Unique combinations alter the boss fight.
    Discover hidden Patterns to pave for new, Endgame Character classes, Weapons, Perks and other Secrets.

    Featuring an Original Soundtrack Composed and Produced by Kāru

    JOIN OUR COMMUNITY

    We're a brood of passionate artists and developers, come say hi! We don't bite unless you want us to :>

    Don't be afraid to talk to us, we're busy working on the game but will respond when we're able to!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS 3.0
  • Processor: AMD APU
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 RDNA 2 CUs, 1.0-1.6GH
  • Storage: 2780 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: N/A
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS 3.0
  • Processor: AMD APU
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 RDNA 2 CUs, 1.0-1.6GH
  • Storage: 2780 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: N/A

name: UNYIELDER

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-6700HQ CPU @ 2.60GHz 2.60 GHz
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2780 MB available space
  • Sound Card: If you can hear something it works
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600 6-Core Processor 3.50 GHz
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2780 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Music Volume to 100% for a surprise
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: N/A

short_description: UNYIELDER is an intense Single-Player Boss-rush Movement FPS with an absurd and exploitable Rogue-Looter. Assemble your Arsenal of Destruction, Smash your way through Antarctica, Face your own Final Boss.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
